mapper.sql: sys_id, order_no, entity_no, pkg_main_id, cates, effect_from, effect_to, is_active, is_terminated, terminated_date, total_amount, remarks, creation_time, create_by, edit_time, edit_by,
mapper.select:
SELECT epm.sys_id, effect_from, effect_to FROM entity_purchse_main epm LEFT JOIN user_entity_mapping uem ON uem.entity_id = epm.entity_no WHERE 1 = 1 AND epm.cates = 2 AND epm.is_active = 1 AND epm.is_terminated = 0
AND uem.user_id = #{params.userId}
AND DATE_FORMAT(epm.effect_from , '%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(#{params.startDate} , '%Y')
AND DATE_FORMAT(epm.effect_from , '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(#{params.startDate} , '%Y-%m')

SELECT epm.order_no, epd.user_cate, epm.entity_no, ehpd_ehpm.pkg_main_id, ehpd_ehpm.pkg_detail_id FROM entity_purchse_main epm LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ehpm.sys_id AS pkg_main_id, ehpd.sys_id AS pkg_detail_id FROM entity_healthy_package_detail ehpd LEFT JOIN entity_healthy_package_main ehpm ON ehpm.sys_id = ehpd.sys_id ) ehpd_ehpm ON ehpd_ehpm.pkg_main_id = epm.pkg_main_id LEFT JOIN entity_purchse_detail epd ON epd.order_no = epm.order_no WHERE epd.is_active=1 AND epd.is_deleted=0
AND epm.order_no=#{orderNo}

SELECT epm.sys_id, epm.order_no, epm.entity_no, se.entity_name, epd.user_cate, epd.user_cate, epd.user_id, ub.full_name, ub.gender AS user_gender, TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, ub.date_of_birth, CURDATE()) AS user_age, ur.relative_id, ur.relative_name, ur.gender AS relative_gender, TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, ur.date_of_birth, CURDATE()) AS relative_age, ur.remark
FROM entity_purchse_main epm LEFT JOIN entity_purchse_detail epd ON epd.order_no = epm.order_no LEFT JOIN sys_entity se ON se.entity_id = epm.entity_no LEFT JOIN user_basic ub ON ub.user_id = epd.user_id LEFT JOIN user_relatives ur ON ur.user_id = ub.user_id WHERE
epd.user_id=#{userId}
GROUP BY ur.relative_id

SELECT epm.sys_id, epm.order_no, epd.user_cate, epd.user_id, ub.full_name, ub.gender AS user_gender, ub.id_card_no AS user_id_card_no, ub.cellphone_no AS user_cellphone_no, ur.relative_id, ur.relative_name, ur.gender AS relative_gender, ur.id_card_no AS relative_id_card_no, ur.cellphone_no AS relative_cellphone_no, uc.card_cates, uc.card_no FROM entity_purchse_main epm LEFT JOIN entity_purchse_detail epd ON epd.order_no = epm.order_no LEFT JOIN user_cards uc ON uc.user_id = epd.user_id LEFT JOIN user_basic ub ON ub.user_id = epd.user_id LEFT JOIN user_relatives ur ON ur.relative_id = epd.user_id WHERE
epm.order_no=#{orderON}
